page.title: 06THE OLD BAKE HOUSE
page.content: THE OLD BAKE HOUSE WAS BUILT ABOUT 400 YEARS AGO(SIXTEENth OR SEVENTEENth CENTURY).THEY HAD NO ELECTRICITY IN THOSE DAYS SO THEY HAD A BIG FIRE. THE HOUSE WHICH THE COOK WOULD LIVE IN HAS GOT A THATCHED ROOF.THE HOUSE HAS ALSO GOT BIG BRICKS.THE REASON WHY IT HAS BIG BRICKS IS BECAUSE THE CORNERS NEED MORE SUPPORT.THE COOKS HOUSE IS NOT ALLOWED TO HAVE ANY OTHER ROOF THAN A THATCHED ONE.ONE SIDE OF THE COOKS HOUSE HAS JUST BEEN RETHATCHED AND IT COST JUST UNDER Â£2,000.THE OLD BAKE HOUSE USED TO HAVE ONE BIG OVEN,WHERE ALL THE MOTHERS AND FAMILYS USED TO TAKE THEIR MEALS TO BE COOKED.THEN THEY WOULD COME AND FETCH THEIR MEALS LATER.
